attributes.action: ALLOW GURKHA SOLDIERS TO STAY IN THE UK-THEY ARE WILLING TO DIE FOR US THE LEAST WE CAN DO.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THE WHOLE OF THE UK SHOULD BE PROUD AND GREATFUL THAT THE GURKHA`S HAVE HELPED TO PROTECT US, THEY ARE VERY BRAVE AND SHOULD BE TREATED WITH RESPECT, THE GOVERNMENT WASTES MONEY ON MANY THINGS WHICH COULD GO TO THIS VERY GOOD CAUSE, SO PLEASE LET THEM STAY IN THIS COUNTRY, IT IS A DISGRACE NOT TO THINK OTHERWISE, GURKHA SOLDIERS WE THANK YOU VERY MUCH, THEY GAVE SO WE SHOULD GIVE.

rejection.details:
There is a similar petition at:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Gurkha-soldiers/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
